name: Star Wars Republic Commando
notes: You will need to download a graphics fix manually, a link will be provided during the installation process

files.graphics-fix: N/A:Select the graphics fix zip file downloaded from https://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-republic-commando-graphics-fix/downloads/graphics-fix

execute.command: mv "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/LECIntro.avi" "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/LECIntro.avi.bak"
mv "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/NVIDIAIntro.avi" "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/NVIDIAIntro.avi.bak"

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
- graphics-fix: N/A:Select the graphics fix zip file downloaded from https://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-republic-commando-graphics-fix/downloads/graphics-fix
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/System/SWRepublicCommando.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/
    file: graphics-fix
- execute:
    command: mv "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/LECIntro.avi"
      "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/LECIntro.avi.bak"
- execute:
    command: mv "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/NVIDIAIntro.avi"
      "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - Republic Commando/GameData/Movies/NVIDIAIntro.avi.bak"
